about_the_game:
Welcome to Custom Fire, the ultimate destination for adrenaline-fueled, modular gun-building PvP mayhem! Immerse yourself in a beautiful toon world, where creativity meets chaos, and only the best Gunsmiths survive

MODULAR GUN CRAFTING:
Unleash your inner engineer as you customize every aspect of your weaponry. Mix and match chambers, barrels, stocks, grips, and more to create the perfect firearm for your playstyle. Find and use the best combinations to stay one step ahead of your opponents.

INTENSE PVP BATTLES:
Step onto the battlefield and engage in heart-pounding, fast-paced PvP action. Challenge your friends or test your skills against players from around the world. Only the most skilled marksmen and the cleverest gunsmiths will dominate the competition.

FUTURE PLANS INCLUDE:
- Competitive Ranked Mode
- Continuous Gun Parts
- Gun part skins
- More Game Modes
